Subjects: Virgin Mary, praise of; Virgin Mary, prayers to; Katherine of Alexandria, saint; translations
_description: Verses in praise of the Virgin Mary, Saint Katherine, and others — five quatrains (abab)

HarRich44.First Lines:
Heyl maystresse of RethorionsHeyl spouse of crist IhesuHeyl
                    mene for Synful felonsHeyl riche in merites and valu…
HarRich44.Last Lines:
…Heyl Kateryne chaste and charitableHeyl mayden mylde and
                    mekeHeyl after oon moost acceptableTo god and good men eke
HarRich44.Note:
Translates Latin verse on f. 63; with heading, ‘the same prayere
                    in ewnglysshe’ (f. 63v).
